Chi Minh City has detected 13 cases of monkey pox,
including clusters of up to 34
cases at the same time. To promptly detect and
avoid spreading in the community,
authorities have increased
control measures.  Investigate and monitor as well as prepare
prevention and treatment measures.
Currently, medical facilities in
Ho Chi Minh City have prepared
Loc floor examinations and isolation treatment areas
for patients with blindness.  When
required, the representatives also have
disease prevention plans available for medical staff who are
experiencing community spread
in
certain risk groups in the community.
Therefore, all

directed at encouraging and supporting
these at-risk groups so that they will agree
to self-monitor their health
when detecting disease.  If you suspect that you have eggs, you
will go to a medical facility to receive
instructions from a doctor about how to care for the health sector.
People are advised that if they discover that they or
someone around them has symptoms of suspected
monkey blindness, they should immediately go to a health facility.
health department for advice on diagnosis and
treatment, paying special attention to subjects with
underlying medical conditions and pregnant women.

are also sheltering in

200 mm, the highest level in the past 59 years.

According to the plan, Ho Chi Minh City will
conduct a general inspection of
motel businesses, rooms for rent, mini apartments
and old apartments to ensure
fire safety and prevention accordingly. This morning, October 11,
the delegation  Interdisciplinary work has conducted an
inspection of the H3 apartment complex in the private district. The
investor of the H3 apartment complex is very interested in
fire prevention and fighting. The apartment management desk
has also established an
on-site fire prevention and fighting force with 48 people.
Standing members are ready to respond
when a fire or explosion incident occurs. However,
through inspection, the functional forces
discovered a number of violations and issued
additional warnings to rooms with
risk phenomena.  In case of non-compliance with the
original design, the unit requires the apartment complex to be
rectified immediately in the near future.
Interdisciplinary inspection teams will continue to inspect
and resolutely suspend penalties for
serious violations in the
city.  At 1:30 on October 11,
2023, a house fire occurred on
Tran Cao Van street, Da Nang city. The
incident caused two children, 12 years old and 14
years old, to commit
suicide. We received information from the
police.  Tam Thuan ward and the
fire prevention and rescue force of
Thanh Khe District Police were at the scene using
fire extinguishers to spray continuously on the
fire on the first floor. During this process, the
forces rescued three people.  The
remaining two children in the house were Tran Minh Gia
Dat, 14 years old, Nguyen Le Thai Thuan, 12 years old,
on the 3rd floor due to smoke and music leading to death. It was not
until 3:00 a.m. the same day that the firefighting force
completely extinguished the fire.
Historically, the alleys along
Tran Cao Van street in Da Nang
are all small, only about 2m to over
3m wide, so it is difficult to prevent fires. This
is the third fire to occur in Da Nang since the
beginning of October.  The three burned houses were all
located in Kiet

investigation after only one day until the afternoon of October 10.

in the form of an

Cuba's 104-year-old Dorothy Hofner became the

Binh Phuoc province in  When turning left,

bearing the Binh Phuoc license plate, was carried by a man
